title: Product Designer
description: Looking to take your design skills to the next level and make a real impact in the world? Come join us at Indepay | Setara Networks, where we're changing the game in the payment industry. Our goal is to make digital transactions fast, secure, and zero-fee.We’re not just building a payment platform, we’re creating a movement that empowers people to transact without worrying about fees and security concerns. As a problem solver, you’ll be at the forefront of this movement, defining what a great user experience looks and feels like.To help us achieve this mission, we're looking for a Product Designer who can define what a great payment experience feels like. As a strategic partner to our talented business and engineering leaders, you'll help us foster a customer-focused culture and scale our organization to new heightsThe ideal candidate has spent 1-2 years researching, designing, and executing experiences for Indonesian customers. You'll be equally skilled at tackling the human and software side of design and have experience setting up and scaling research and design practices. With great attention to detail, you'll ship delightful software experiences that customers will love.This is a rare opportunity to be one of the first designers at Indepay | Setara Networks and help shape the future of payment solutions in Indonesia. Don't miss out on the chance to be a game-changer in the industry. Apply now and let's revolutionize payments together!And in this we can simplify the way we try to abort the transactionResponsibilitiesSpecialize in one of our core product areas and work closely with engineers and product managers to define both the long-term strategy and the short-term tactics for that productWork closely with designers on your team to develop and expand product design systemsSometimes work on very broadly defined, loose concepts, and sometimes on narrowly defined, tactical deliverablesFocus on what you do best — whether that’s sketches, wireframes, prototypes, designs, or code—and you’ll have the opportunity to sharpen the skills you’re looking to developWork in a highly collaborative fashion with the design, product, and project teamsPartner closely with user researchers, content designers, brand designers, and other disciplinesParticipate in design reviews and share your work regularly with thedesign and company leadershipRequirementsCan reduce complex challenges down to the right balance of flexibility, power, and ease of useHas experience designing for both business and consumer-focused productsHas a high quality bar, attention to detail, and helps teams deliver high quality polished experiencesIs skilled in explaining their work, process, and decisions to cross-functional stakeholders and who craves feedback to help produce the best workIs an expert in either UI, UX, or visual design, but is skilled in more disciplines across product designThinks in systems and is able to extrapolate and extend shared patterns and behaviorsHas 1+ years relevant product design experienceFamiliarity with front-end development and payment application and/or e-commerce platformsBenefitsCompetitive salaries and generous benefitsOpportunity to work alongside passionate and talented individualsEntrepreneurship culture with a focus on creating a budding ground for future entrepreneursPerks and flexibility of a technology product company

title: UI/UX Product Designer for US Based Health-Tech Company
description: Paired is a global staffing and recruiting agency that specializes in pairing remote work with top-tier talent. We help individuals from around the world connect with great companies that are looking for their specific skill set. Our mission is to provide great jobs to talented people, no matter where they are located.We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Product UX/UI Designer for our Health-Tech Client. A Product UX/UI Designer is responsible for creating exceptional user experiences and visually appealing user interfaces for digital products, websites, and applications. The role involves understanding user needs, business requirements, and technological constraints to design intuitive, user-friendly interfaces. The Product UX/UI Designer collaborates closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and stakeholders, to ensure the design solutions meet both user and business goals.Key Responsibilities:User Research and Analysis:Conduct user research to understand user behaviors, needs, and motivationsAnalyze user data and feedback to inform design decisionsInformation Architecture:Develop site maps, user flows, and wireframes to outline the structure and flow of digital productsEnsure intuitive navigation and seamless user journeysInteraction Design:Create interactive prototypes and high-fidelity mockupsDesign intuitive and responsive user interactions and animationsVisual Design:Develop visually appealing user interfaces, incorporating branding elements and design patternsChoose appropriate color schemes, typography, and iconography for the best user experienceUsability Testing:Conduct usability testing sessions to gather feedback on designsIterate on designs based on user testing results and feedbackCollaboration:Work closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and constraintsCollaborate with developers to ensure the feasibility of design solutions and their successful implementationDocumentation:Create detailed design specifications and guidelines for developersMaintain design documentation and version controlRequirementsBachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or related field (Master's degree preferred)Proven experience as a UX/UI Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing innovative design solutionsProficiency in design tools such as Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma, or similarStrong understanding of user-centered design principles and usabilityExperience with user research methodologies and usability testingKnowledge of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and their impact on design implementationExcellent communication and collaboration skillsAbility to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment and manage multiple projects simultaneouslyBenefitsCompetitive salaryWork From HomeFlexible Hours

title: UI/X Designer
description: We are seeking a talented UI/X Designer to join our team. You will play a crucial role in shaping the user experience and visual design of our products, ensuring they are not only visually appealing but also intuitive and user-friendly.Responsibilities:Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including product managers and developers, to understand project requirements and user needs. Creating visually stunning and responsive user interfaces for our mobile applications, web, and HMI. Designing interactive prototypes and wireframes to communicate design concepts effectively. Conducting user research, usability testing, and gathering feedback to inform design decisions. Analyzing user journeys and workflows to improve overall user experiences. Iterating on designs based on user feedback and usability findings. Ensuring consistent branding and visual design across all platforms. Creating personas, user flows, and journey maps to guide the design process. Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or any related field and/or minimum of 3 years of proven experience in UI/UX design for web and mobile applications. Proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, or similar. Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and design thinking. Excellent visual design skills, including layout, color, and typography. Experience with user research, usability testing, and user-centered design methodologies. Strong problem-solving and communication skills. Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, cross-functional environment. Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and/or JavaScript is a plus. Experience working in an EV (Electric Vehicle) project or company is a plus. About ION MobilityWe are pushing the frontiers of what is possible by developing desirable products as clean alternatives for urban users, to alleviate urban air pollution, and to lead the inevitable transition to EVs across Southeast Asia. Our team is constantly pushing the boundaries of innovation and design to create an electric riding experience that doesn't compromise on quality or style.Join the team to bring about the future of mobility with us today!

title: UI/UX Specialist
description: What You DoClarify the assigned design project scope, including its goals, requirements, and expectationsTranslate accurate visualizations from design concepts based on communicated requirementsExecute sketch, prototypes, visualisations, and mock-ups design needed by the engineers for developmentCreate visualisation of user journey using methods and tools such as userflow / storyboard / illustrationProduce the visual designs and test specifications for new visual ideas and participating in design researchConsolidate visual audit and/or visual research findings on competitors’ projects and market trends as part of report preparation to be circulated to relevant stakeholdersGenerate ideas for new visual design concepts and prototypesParticipate in design research and workshop activities for insights gatheringPrototype and test proposed design solutions and iterate based on the intended design specifications to ensure its readiness to be implemented for launch in its respective platformCommunicate outcomes of design tests and incorporate feedback from previous iterations of visual designs into subsequent mock-ups and future projects and design tasksConduct usability and concept testing of design prototypesRecommend refinements and iterations to design based on usability and concept testing results, including identifying potential big ideas for future improvementMonitor the quality of the visual user interaction and the design from success metric performance overtime, and provide actionable insights to improve product performanceWhat You BringBetween 1–3 years overall work experience as a hands-on Designer in the industry (education background could range from Visual Communication Design, Interaction Design, Product Design, Service Design, or any other relevant Digital Design disciplines; or Human-Computer Interaction, Computer Science, or other related field, with equivalent practical design experience).Portfolio that showcases visual design craft (and its application of visual communication design principles) with some level of understanding of the Human Centered Design methodology, willingness to learn and iterate, and passionate about design and storytelling.Experience working with web or mobile based technologies using design and prototyping tools (such as Figma, FigJam, Maze, Adobe Creative Cloud, etc.)Fluency in English communications (both verbal and written).A deep sense of accountability, adaptability, and embracing ambiguity working collaboratively in a fast-paced environment34250 | IT & Tech Engineering | Professional | Non-Executive | Allianz Indonesia | Full-Time | PermanentAllianz Group is one of the most trusted insurance and asset management companies in the world. Caring for our employees, their ambitions, dreams and challenges, is what makes us a unique employer. Together we can build an environment where everyone feels empowered and has the confidence to explore, to grow and to shape a better future for our customers and the world around us.We at Allianz believe in a diverse and inclusive workforce and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We encourage you to bring your whole self to work, no matter where you are from, what you look like, who you love or what you believe in.We therefore welcome applications regardless of ethnicity or cultural background, age, gender, nationality, religion, disability or sexual orientation.Join us. Let's care for tomorrow.Note: Diversity of minds is an integral part of Allianz’ company culture. One means to achieve diverse teams is a regular rotation of Allianz Executive employees across functions, Allianz entities and geographies. Therefore, the company encourages its employees to have motivation in gaining varied skills from different positions and to collect experiences from across Allianz Group.

title: Product Designer
description: Skills Required for a Product Designer JobA bachelor's degree in design, computer science, or a related field is required.Work experience as a UI/UX designer or in a related role is required (min 2-3 years).Portfolio of work in UI/UX design for mobile or web platforms.Excellent knowledge of Sketch, Figma, iOS, Android, Adobe Creative Suite, and other software.Ability to work both in a team and independentlyGood english verbal and written communication abilitiesGreat time administrationGood teamwork attitudeProduct Designer Job ResponsibilitiesCollect and evaluate user requirements with the help of product managers, engineers & UX researchers.Use storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps to illustrate design concepts.Good experience working with design systems & guidelinesCreate UI mockups and prototypes that clearly show how the product work and look.Rough draughts should be prepared and presented to internal teams and key stakeholders.Identify and resolve UX issues.Make layout changes based on user feedback.
